title: Gpu problem
body:
I decided to test my old rig for bottelneck and what I found is that the Gpu and Cpu usage are equal. They stay around 55% - 65% usage with fps 45 - 55. I change the settings to high without shadows to see if theres any changes in the usage but they were still the same except the fps which was 30 fps. 
So my question is what to do to make the Gpu usage at 90% - 99%  in other words how to make it work at full power ?

My old rig is :
Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) Dual  CPU  E2180  @ 2.00GHz (2 CPUs)
Memory: 1536MB RAM
Operating System: Windows XP Professional Service Pack 3
NVIDIA GeForce 210  512.0 MB
DirectX 9.0c
